name: Assigned Mech At Birth
description:
Story

You are a prototype robot invented by a company known as Cyan Science INC.  Unfortunately for them, you've escaped their facility and your goal is to run as far away as you can.

Controls (Controller support!)

A&D / Left Joystick = Moving left and right

Mouse / Right Joystick = Aiming

Left Mouse Button / Right Back Trigger = Knife Throw

Spacebar / Left Back Trigger = Jump / Ground Pound

Other mechanics

The Blue, Green and Red orbs all heal you differently.

Blue-Heals a bit

Green-Extra HP

Red-Full heal

Extras Credits

Input 5- Juju Adams / Controller support!

Create Trails - SCR / Fancy trail for the flying enemy
